title: La course au sommet de la tour Eiffel (The Race to the Top of the Eiffel Tower)
itunes:title: La course au sommet de la tour Eiffel (The Race to the Top of the Eiffel Tower)
description:
When Valérie Hirschfield lost her leg, she made a promise to her family that she would bounce back stronger than ever — a promise that would one day lead her to race up France’s most iconic monument.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3H41se7.
